sections.heading: Transfer of custody; answerIf the custody has been transferred prior to service of the writ, the person upon whom the writ was served shall state in his answer the name and address of the person to whom custody was transferred, the time of and the authority for the transfer, and the place where the
sections.text: Transfer of custody; answerIf the custody has been transferred prior to service of the writ, the person upon whom the writ was served shall state in his answer the name and address of the person to whom custody was transferred, the time of and the authority for the transfer, and the place where the person is then in custody.
